information builders is a data
management and analytics platform we do
that for the most complex of
environments and we do that in the class
prior to our partnership with AWS
managed services our customers will
consume our solutions 100% on-premise
customers would have to install our
products configure them they'd have to
be responsible for all of the IT
management and scaling of our products
within their IT environments so our
existing customers that in the majority
of them being on Prem and still being
fairly new to the cloud there is a
tremendous amount of risk adverse to to
the cloud the partnership with with AWS
and AMS brings that credibility to the
table instantaneously we can answer
those questions with complete confidence
we can get our customers and prospects
moving forward after we made a decision
to go with AMS our first step was to
work with them and a partner to stand up
our IP cloud environment the end-to-end
go to market was really 90 days which is
amazing really we would never have been
able to accomplish that ourselves
because we would have had to bring on
and hire AWS specific expertise figure
out how to configure this environment so
it could be so customers could be using
it in the future with the automation
that we set up with AMS in the cloud we
can spend that customer up literally in
a matter of an hour - and they can start
to see value in the platform immediately
one of the biggest risk that we saw that
AMS helped mitigate was the security
risk when you think about what it takes
to provide an industry compliant secure
environment for customers and the
potential liability involved you really
need to have experts defining that
environment and and also monitoring it
and making sure that it remains secure
and hardened throughout the customers
production cycles
by virtue of this AMS environment that
was stood up for our customers in the
partnership we automatically inherits
probably over 100 industry
certifications everything from PCI to
HIPAA compliance and and and our
customers really expect this and it
gives them a level of confidence in
implementing in our cloud environment
that frankly as a standalone company
like ours we couldn't have provided
ourselves so we're just getting started
and the acceleration around the adoption
of the offering the excitement around
the offering it's just going to
accelerate from here I can't even begin
to imagine where we're going to be a
year from now we made a big bet with AWS
and AMS and that's the combination of
great infrastructure and great partners
through the managed services group and
and we'd make that bet again
